# .Huge[**.stretch[Poverty & Inequality]**] <br> .bluey[.LARGE[**GLOA 610**]] <br>


```{r include=F, cache=T}


library(WDI)


var = c('poverty' = 'SI.POV.DDAY',
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'inequality' = 'SI.POV.GINI',
        'Infant.Mortality' = 'SP.DYN.IMRT.IN'
        )

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1960,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

wdi %>% 
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 10000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 10000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) -> wdi2

```

# Global Poverty .tiny[(you've seen this one before)]

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6.5, cache=T}


wdi2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=poverty,
             group=developed,
             color=developed,
             fill=developed)) +
  geom_point(size=0.5, alpha=0.25) +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Poverty Rates")

```

# Inequality in Some Countries 

--

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6.5}

library(ggrepel)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

load("/Users/bson3/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-GeorgeMasonUniversity-O365Production/data_repo/swiid9_9/swiid9_9.rda")


name <- c("United States", 
          "China", 
          "Brazil",
          "Sweden",
          "Australia")

swiid_summary %>%
  filter(country==name) %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  mutate(max_year = max(year)) %>%
  mutate(label = if_else(year == max_year, as.character(country), NA_character_)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=gini_disp, 
             #group=country,
             color=country, 
             fill=country)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = gini_disp-1.96*gini_disp_se,
                  ymax = gini_disp+1.96*gini_disp_se), 
              alpha = .25, color=NA) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label=label), fill=NA,
                   nudge_x = 1, nudge_y = -1, size=8) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Gini Coefficient")


```
